faq1_a: Our minimum order for free delivery is $200.00 USD. Orders below this amount have a $15.00 shipping fee.
faq2_a: For fresh products, you must report the issue within 24 hours of delivery. We will issue an immediate credit note or replacement on the next order.
faq3_a: Yes, we deliver on Saturdays until 2:00 PM. There is no route service on Sundays, but you can place orders for Monday.
